${modID}:Mirror_Shard.NAME: Mirror Shard
${modID}:Mirror_Shard.FLAVOR: A shard broken off with a reflection of the Ironclad, perhaps from a previous reincarnation?

${modID}:Hand_Of_Midas.NAME: Hand of Midas
DESCRIPTIONS: #yHand #yof #yGreed now grants double gold on kill. NL NL Upon pickup, upgrade all held #yHand #yof #yGreed(s) and obtain #b3 copies.

${modID}:Thorned_Crown.NAME: Thorned Crown
${modID}:Thorned_Crown.FLAVOR: A makeshift version of busted crown.

DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, gain #y2 copies of #yNormality. NL NL Duplicate every card in your deck and gain #y10 gold for each card duplicated.

turns, add a random #ySkill into your hand.

${modID}:Narcissus.NAME: Narcissus
${modID}:Narcissus.FLAVOR: The man, the myth, the legend.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #yLimit #yBreak. It has #yPurge and costs #b0.

${modID}:Silene.NAME: Silene
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal #b10% of damage taken at the end of combat.

${modID}:Marigold.NAME: Marigold
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yGold equal to #b25% of the damage dealt in combat, but only for the first #b100 damage dealt. NL NL For every #b100 #yGold gained from this effect, draw #b1 card at the start of combat.

${modID}:Hemlock.NAME: Hemlock
${modID}:Hemlock.FLAVOR: I love the smell of hemlock in the morning.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon entering a Rest Site, #yScry #b1 for every #b6 cards in your deck at the start of your next combat.

${modID}:Cardoon.NAME: Cardoon
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 4 Attacks in a single turn, gain the #yNoxious #yFumes buff.

${modID}:Blue_Ashes.NAME: Blue Ashes

${modID}:Equinox.NAME: Equinox
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b10 Attacks, play the top card of your draw pile.

${modID}:Terrifying_Trinket.NAME: Terrifying Trinket
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b3, all Minions run away.

${modID}:Sweater.NAME: Sweater
${modID}:Sweater.FLAVOR: Oh the weather outside is frightful!

${modID}:Alchemists_Mask.NAME: Alchemist's Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to activate. Set your #yGold to #b0. NL At the end of your turn, if you have #b0 #yGold, obtain a random #bPotion and add a random #rCurse to your deck and draw pile.

${modID}:Short_Circuit.NAME: Short Circuit

${modID}:Burning_Stone.NAME: Burning Stone
